name: Copa Petrobras de Marcas
summary: COPA PETROBRAS DE MARCAS is a 100% free official game simulating the thrill of competing wheel-to-wheel with models from various automakers in some of the main Brazilian race tracks.
info:
• 中文名: 巴西石油大奖赛

  • 发行日期: 2014-11-29
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: http://www.gamemarcas.com.br/
